br.com.depasser.web.resource
Interface Processor

public interface Processor

A resource processor can be used to process a specified resource type. Any kind of processing can be done, including: compressing and obfuscation.

Each Type can have one or more processors that can be invoked in a specified order. The order

Author:
Vinicius Isola (viniciusisola@gmail.com)

Method Detail

process

java.lang.String process(java.lang.String content)
                         throws java.lang.Exception

Parameters:

Returns:
The processed content.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If any error occur while processing the content.

supportType

boolean supportType(java.lang.String typeName)
Check if this processor supports the specified type.

Parameters:
typeName - Name of the type to check for.
Returns:
True if this processor can be used to process resources of this type.
